name: Tabit
text:
—Leader, you're here!
Summons request, received.
Tabit, reunion... very happy!

name: Tabit
text:
Tabit, mission, executed on Earth.
Comrades also present, standby for mission in Orient City.

name: Tabit
text:
Leader, do you have an order for Tabit?
Tabit, will do anything.
Leader, may use freely!

name: Tabit
text:
Valentine, chocolate...?
Present for Tabit?
...Please wait a moment.

name: Tabit
text:
—Search complete, multiple matches.
Earth custom, chocolate gifting.
Important, feelings, for partner... target.

name: Tabit
text:
Tabit also values Leader.
Important comrade, but special.
...Feelings, verbalization, difficult.

name: Tabit
text:
Tabit, will return favor to Leader.
Leader likes chocolate?

name: Tabit
text:
—Proposal.
Install cooking program on Tabit.
Chocolate manufacturing, supplied.

name: Tabit
text:
—Store search, complete.
Want to purchase ingredients,
Leader, come together, request.

Saying that, Tabit gently took [Player]'s hand—
and their eyes widened at his body temperature.

name: Tabit
text:
Leader!?
Surface temperature, decreased, confirmed.
Urgent, maintenance, required!

name: Tabit
text:
Body temperature adjustment... complete.
Leader, do not move.

name: Tabit
text:
With this temperature, organic life-form body, will be maintained.
Leader, come closer.
Increase contact area.

name: Tabit
text:
Happy feeling, too big.
Thought, processing, uncontrollable.
No error, confirmed.

name: Tabit
text:
Leader, request awaiting approval.
Want to stay like this a little longer.
...No?
